name: sap.watt.ideplatform.debug.core.service.extension.DebugSuspendProcessor
description: A debug suspend processor interface provides access to resume/suspend functionality.

canResume.description: Distinguishes whether resume can be processed.

returns.description: True if resume can be processed, false otherwise.

canSuspend.description: Distinguishes whether suspend can be processed.

returns.description: True if suspend can be processed, false otherwise.
